profile.name: Kathy Ferguson
profile.title: Cost Segregation Specialist
profile.description: Kathy Ferguson specializes in helping property owners and business owners reduce their tax burden through cost segregation studies and R&D tax credits. With expertise in identifying property-related expenses and available tax benefits, Kathy helps clients keep more money in their business instead of tied up in taxes.

services.name: Free Cost Segregation Analysis
services.description: Learn how much you can save today and in the future

services.name: Tax Burden Reduction
services.description: Keep more money in your business, not tied up in taxes

services.name: Property Expense Identification
services.description: Identify all property-related expenses and available tax benefits

services.name: Tax Compliance Consulting
services.description: Better understand recent tax law changes and update your practices
